Event.name: Commerce_money-transfer
Event.definition: <def-root>The subframe of the Commercial_transaction frame which involves the transfer of Money from the Buyer to the Seller (in exchange for the Goods).</def-root>

Arg.name: Buyer
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Buyer</fen> wants the <fen>Goods</fen> and offers <fen>Money</fen> to a <fen>Seller</fen> in exchange for them. <ex><fex name="Buyer">Jess</fex> <t>bought</t> a coat.</ex> <ex>Lee <t>sold</t> a textbook <fex name="Buyer">to Abby</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Goods
Arg.definition: <def-root>The FE <fen>Goods</fen> is anything (including labor or time, for example) which is exchanged for <fen>Money</fen> in a transaction. <ex>Kim <t>bought</t> <fex name="Goods">the sweater</fex>.</ex> <ex>Kim <t>sold</t> <fex name="Goods">the sweater</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Means
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Means</fen> by which a commercial transaction occurs. <ex>Abby <t>bought</t> the car <fex name="Means">with cash</fex>.</ex> <ex>Robin <t>paid</t> for the car <fex name="Means">by check</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Money
Arg.definition: <def-root><fen>Money</fen> is the thing given in exchange for <fen>Goods</fen> in a transaction. <ex>Pat <t>paid</t> <fex name="Money">14 dollars</fex> for a movie ticket.</ex> <ex>Sam <t>sold</t> the car <fex name="Money">for $12,000</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Rate
Arg.definition: <def-root>In some cases, price or payment is described per unit of <fen>Goods</fen>. <ex>The manager <t>pays</t> the paper boys <fex name="Rate">five dollars an hour</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Seller
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Seller</fen> has possession of the <fen>Goods</fen> and exchanges them for <fen>Money</fen> from a <fen>Buyer</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Unit
Arg.definition: <def-root>This FE is any unit in which goods or services can be measured. Generally, it occurs in a <ment>by</ment>-PP. <ex>Bob <t>sells</t> peppers <fex name="Unit">by the pound</fex>. </ex> <ex>Lee <t>buys</t> potatoes <fex name="Unit">by the pound</fex>.</ex> </def-root>

Arg.name: Explanation
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fex name="Explanation">Explanation</fex> for which an event occurs.</def-root>

Arg.name: Manner
Arg.definition: <def-root>A description of the transfer not covered by more specific FEs, including secondary effects (<ment>quietly, loudly</ment>) and general descriptions comparing events (<ment>the same way</ment>). In addition, it may indicate salient characteristics of a <fen>Buyer</fen>, <fen>Seller</fen>, or <fen>Exchangers</fen> that also affect the action (<ment>presumptuously, coldly, deliberately, eagerly, carefully</ment>).</def-root>

Arg.name: Purpose
Arg.definition: <def-root>The state-of-affairs that the <fen>Buyer</fen>, <fen>Seller</fen>, or <fen>Exchangers</fen> wish to bring about by participating in the exchange.</def-root>

Arg.name: Exchangers
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The individuals participating in the commercial exchange, otherwise encoded as <fen>Buyer</fen> and <fen>Seller</fen>.
</def-root>
